title: A1cipher和失败的艺作们
content:
[[div style="background: #ed1c24; width: 500px; margin: 0 auto; font-size: 20px; padding: 0px;"]]
 
@@ @@

[[=]]
++* ##black|欢迎来到我的艺作页。##
##black|把你所有的期望放在左边##

##black|然后享受你的短暂停留。##
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[/div]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab 项目涂鸦，作为我的“风格”]]

++ __系列I__

++++ 一开始，这里只有一点杂草。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-001-shaggydredlocks的提案 “破晓之时” ▷ |hide=SCP-001-shaggydredlocks的提案“破晓之时” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D001|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-096“害羞的人” ▷ |hide=SCP-096“害羞的人” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D096|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-106 “恐怖老人” ▷ |hide=SCP-106 “恐怖老人” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D106|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-173 “雕像 - 最初之作” ▷ |hide=SCP-173 “雕像 - 最初之作” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D173|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-407 “创始之歌”和SCP-131 ““眼豆”” ▷ |hide=SCP-407 “创始之歌”和SCP-131 ““眼豆””  ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D407|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-999 “痒痒怪” ▷ |hide=SCP-999 “痒痒怪” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D999|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]


++ __系列II__

++++ 然后百姓生长。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-1005 “画人” ▷ |hide=SCP-1005 “画人” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D1005|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-1103 “Dr. Wondertainment的小小外科医生套装” ▷ |hide=SCP-1103 “Dr. Wondertainment的小小外科医生套装” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D1103|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-1360 “PSHUD 31号” ▷ |hide=SCP-1360 “PSHUD 31号” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D1360|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-1657 “人蛋” ▷ |hide=SCP-1657 “人蛋” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D1657|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ __系列III__

++++ 然后生长。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-2006 “太吓人啦” ▷ |hide=SCP-2006 “太吓人啦” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D2006|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-2521 “●●Ι●●●●●Ι●●Ι●” ▷ |hide=SCP-2521 “●●Ι●●●●●Ι●●Ι●” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D2521|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-2662 “克苏鲁滚粗！” ▷ |hide=SCP-2662 “克苏鲁滚粗！” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D2662|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-2912 “小丑小丑小” ▷ |hide=SCP-2912 “小丑小丑小” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D2912|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ __系列IV__

++++ 然后继续生长，就像花园里的杂草。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-3001 “红现实” ▷ |hide=SCP-3001 “红现实” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D3001|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-3280 “暴风雨后” ▷ |hide=SCP-3280 “暴风雨后” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D3280|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ __系列V__

++++ 然后一些更奇怪的事情发生了。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-4099 “埋藏于黑暗之中” ▷ |hide=SCP-4099 “埋藏于黑暗之中” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D4099|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-4494 “THE SPECTOR为正义而战！” ▷ |hide=SCP-4494 “THE SPECTOR为正义而战！” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D4494|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-4499 “是的，只要44.99美刀！” ▷ |hide=SCP-4499 “是的，只要44.99美刀！” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D4499|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-4586 “彬彬有礼的维多利亚时代骷髅” ▷ |hide=SCP-4586 “彬彬有礼的维多利亚时代骷髅” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D4586|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ __系列VI__

++++ 杂草像一个刺客的匕首那样射出来，而且继续长得更大。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-5113 “喵主席与武当狗的生活” ▷ |hide=SCP-5113 “喵主席与武当狗的生活” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D5113|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-5383 “Chef Supreme” ▷ |hide=SCP-5383 “Chef Supreme” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D5383|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-5835 “The King In Y̶e̶l̶l̶o̶w̶” ▷ |hide=SCP-5853 “The King In Y̶e̶l̶l̶o̶w̶” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/D5835|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

++ __-J系列__

++++ //然后我们修剪了草坪，一切都好起来了。// 

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-049-J “瘟疫二逼” ▷ |hide=SCP-049-J “瘟疫二逼” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/DJ049|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-682-J “史上最棒的蜥蜴” ▷ |hide=SCP-682-J “史上最棒的蜥蜴” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/DJ682|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-5000-J “饼干失窃之谜” ▷ |hide=SCP-5000-J “饼干失窃之谜” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/DJ5000|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=SCP-SCP-J “是Scippy！” ▷ |hide=SCP-SCP-J “是Scippy！” ▽]]
[[include :scp-sandbox-3:component:image-zoom-2 name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/a1cipher-b/DJSCP|caption=_|width=250px|align=center]]
[[include :scp-int:component:colend]]


++ __人员、警卫以及更多__

++++ 不过，邻居们没那么幸运。

[[include :scp-int:component:coltop show=“安保人员” ▷ |hide=“安保人员” ▽]]
